abstract: United States Open, held each year in Flushing Meadows, Queens, demands annual construction of massive complex, including courts, stadiums, restaurants and shops in Flushing Meadows-Corona Park; process is particularly complicated in 2015 due to simultaneous construction of new steel retractable roof at Arthur Ashe Stadium.
lead_paragraph: A miniature metropolis quickly takes shape in Flushing Meadows every August. With a stadium under construction this year, “quickly" became an understatement.

headline.main: A City Rises in Queens for the U.S. Open
headline.print_headline: Just in Time, a City Rises in Queens

snippet: A miniature metropolis quickly takes shape in Flushing Meadows every August. With a stadium under construction this year, “quickly" became an understatement.

keywords.value: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center
